short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allow you to change the images used for dynamic product ads in Facebook Ads Manager.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Feedr Chrome Plugin allow you to change the design of your Facebook and Instagram Dynamic Product Ads. 

This will allow you to A/B test and run different templates for different ads, while still using the same catalog inside Meta Commerce Manager.

To use this extension you will need an account on feedr.com (14 day free trial available).
